featured.text: Which of the following is true about the modern development of the flip-flop? (A) Modern flip-flops originated from Indian toe knob sandals.
In India, “toe knob” sandals had a knob between the first and second toes.

definition.zh_def: 圓形或橢圓形的把手，通常用於開關或調節設備。
definition.en_def: A rounded handle or control on a door, drawer, or piece of equipment.
definition.example: She turned the knob to open the door.
